verses.verse: Now <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3324>Izhar,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> and <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab,<s%> and <S%H203>On,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6431>Peleth,<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> men:

And they <S%H6965>rose<s%> up <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> with <S%H582>certain<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H5387>princes<s%> of the <S%H5712>assembly,<s%> <S%H7148>famous<s%> in the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H8034>renown:<s%>

And they <S%H6950>gathered<s%> themselves together <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, You take too <S%H7227>much<s%> on you, <S%H3588>seeing<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> are <S%H6918>holy,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one of them, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H8432>among<s%> them: <S%H4069>why<s%> then <S%H5375>lift<s%> you up yourselves <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%>
And when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, he <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H6440>face:<s%>

And he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H7141>Korah<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5712>company,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Even to <S%H1242>morrow<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H3045>show<s%> <S%H853>who<s%> <S%H834><s%> are his, and <S%H853>who<s%> is <S%H6918>holy;<s%> and will cause him to <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to him: even him <S%H834>whom<s%> he has <S%H977>chosen<s%> will he cause to <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to him.
<S%H2063>This<s%> <S%H6213>do;<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> you <S%H4289>censers,<s%> <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5712>company;<s%>

And <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H2004>therein,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> in them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H4279>morrow:<s%> and it shall be that the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> does <S%H977>choose,<s%> he shall be <S%H6918>holy:<s%> you take too <S%H7227>much<s%> on you, you <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, you <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi:<s%>

Seems it but a <S%H4592>small<s%> thing to you, that the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H914>separated<s%> you from the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H7126>bring<s%> you <S%H7138>near<s%> to himself to <S%H5647>do<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to them?

And he has <S%H7126>brought<s%> you <S%H7138>near<s%> to him, and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> with you: and <S%H1245>seek<s%> you the <S%H3550>priesthood<s%> <S%H1571>also?<s%>

For which <S%H3651>cause<s%> both you and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5712>company<s%> are <S%H3259>gathered<s%> together <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> that you <S%H3885>murmur<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him?

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab:<s%> which <S%H559>said,<s%> We will not <S%H5927>come<s%> up:

Is it a <S%H4592>small<s%> thing that you have <S%H5927>brought<s%> us up out of a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>flows<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> us in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H3588>except<s%> you make yourself <S%H1571>altogether<s%> a <S%H8323>prince<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us?

<S%H637>Moreover<s%> you have not <S%H935>brought<s%> us into a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>flows<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> or <S%H5414>given<s%> us <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H7704>fields<s%> and <S%H3754>vineyards:<s%> will you <S%H5365>put<s%> out the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H1992>these<s%> <S%H582>men?<s%> we will not <S%H5927>come<s%> up.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>wroth,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H6437>Respect<s%> not you their <S%H4503>offering:<s%> I have not <S%H5375>taken<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2543>ass<s%> from them, <S%H3808>neither<s%> have I <S%H7489>hurt<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of them.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> Be you and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5712>company<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you, and they, and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> to <S%H4279>morrow:<s%>

And <S%H3947>take<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4289>censer,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> in them, and <S%H7126>bring<s%> you <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4289>censer,<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H4289>censers;<s%> you also, and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> of you his <S%H4289>censer.<s%>

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4289>censer,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in them, and <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H5921>thereon,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>

And <S%H7141>Korah<s%> <S%H6950>gathered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H914>Separate<s%> yourselves from <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> that I may <S%H3615>consume<s%> them in a <S%H7281>moment.<s%>

And they <S%H5307>fell<s%> on their <S%H6440>faces,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H410>God,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirits<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> shall <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2398>sin,<s%> and will you be <S%H7107>wroth<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation?<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5927>Get<s%> you up from <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> <S%H1885>Dathan,<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram;<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> him.

And he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5493>Depart,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, from the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H408>nothing<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of <S%H1992>their's,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> you be <S%H5595>consumed<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H2403>sins.<s%>

So they <S%H5927>got<s%> up from the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> <S%H1885>Dathan,<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram,<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H5439>side:<s%> and <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out, and <S%H5324>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>door<s%> of their <S%H168>tents,<s%> and their <S%H802>wives,<s%> and their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and their <S%H2945>little<s%> <S%H2945>children.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2063>Hereby<s%> you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4639>works;<s%> for I have not done them of my own <S%H3820>mind.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> men <S%H4191>die<s%> the common <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H120>men,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> if they be <S%H6485>visited<s%> after the <S%H6486>visitation<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H120>men;<s%> then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has not <S%H7971>sent<s%> me.

But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1254>make<s%> a <S%H1278>new<s%> thing, and the <S%H127>earth<s%> <S%H6475>open<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H1104>swallow<s%> them up, with <S%H3605>all<s%> that appertain to them, and they <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H2416>quick<s%> into the <S%H7585>pit;<s%> then you shall <S%H3045>understand<s%> that these <S%H582>men<s%> have <S%H5006>provoked<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, as he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> that the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H1234>split<s%> asunder that was <S%H8478>under<s%> them:

And the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> them up, and their <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H120>men<s%> that appertained to <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H7399>goods.<s%>

They, and <S%H3605>all<s%> that appertained to them, <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> into the <S%H7585>pit,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3680>closed<s%> on them: and they <S%H6>perished<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that were <S%H5439>round<s%> about them <S%H5127>fled<s%> at the <S%H6963>cry<s%> of them: for they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6435>Lest<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1104>swallow<s%> us up also.

And there <S%H3318>came<s%> out a <S%H784>fire<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H398>consumed<s%> the two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H7126>offered<s%> <S%H7004>incense.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H559>Speak<s%> to <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> that he <S%H7311>take<s%> up the <S%H4289>censers<s%> out of the <S%H8316>burning,<s%> and <S%H2219>scatter<s%> you the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H1973>yonder;<s%> for they are <S%H6942>hallowed.<s%>

The <S%H4289>censers<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2400>sinners<s%> against their own <S%H5315>souls,<s%> let them make them <S%H7555>broad<s%> <S%H6341>plates<s%> for a <S%H6826>covering<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> for they <S%H7126>offered<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> therefore they are <S%H6942>hallowed:<s%> and they shall be a <S%H226>sign<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H4289>censers,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> they that were <S%H8313>burnt<s%> had <S%H7126>offered;<s%> and they were made <S%H7554>broad<s%> plates for a <S%H6826>covering<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar:<s%>

To be a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>stranger,<s%> <S%H2114><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is not of the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to offer <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> that he be not as <S%H7141>Korah,<s%> and as his <S%H5712>company:<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to him by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

But <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H4283>morrow<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> You have <S%H4191>killed<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> was <S%H6950>gathered<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> that they <S%H6437>looked<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> it, and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H7426>Get<s%> you up from <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> that I may <S%H3615>consume<s%> them as in a <S%H7281>moment.<s%> And they <S%H5307>fell<s%> on their <S%H6440>faces.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> a <S%H4289>censer,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H5921>therein<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H7004>incense,<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H4120>quickly<s%> to the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> and make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for them: for there is <S%H7110>wrath<s%> <S%H3318>gone<s%> out from the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> the <S%H5063>plague<s%> is <S%H2490>begun.<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>commanded,<s%> and <S%H7323>ran<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H6951>congregation;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H5063>plague<s%> was <S%H2490>begun<s%> among the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and he <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H7004>incense,<s%> and made an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
And he <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H4191>dead<s%> and the <S%H2416>living;<s%> and the <S%H4046>plague<s%> was <S%H6113>stayed.<s%>
